install.name: AEC Cart Module
install.author: David 'skOre' Deutsch
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: Module to show the cart from the Account Expiration Control Component.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre Text
param.description: Text that you want to display before the automatically generated text.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post Text
param.description: Text that you want to display after the automatically generated text.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: mode
param.label: Cart Display Mode
param.description: Choose whether you want to show abridged or full cart contents.
param.option: Abridged - Only Item Count and Total
Full - Including per-item cost and quantity

param.name: button
param.label: Button
param.description: With this option, you show a link button that points to the full cart page in AEC.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
